languages.manage.help: Language stored in database are used to store translations for database entity like group names, portal titles, ... Limiting the list of languages to the minimum simplify admin console entry forms.
language.name: Jezik vira
translations.synch.all.help: Za vsak jezik v bazi podatkov preveri, ali obstaja ključ in ga dodaj, če je potrebno.
remoteRecordUrl-help: Oddaljeni zapis je mogoče povezati z zapisom v tem katalogu tako, da izberete URL oddaljenega zapisa. Če je oddaljeni zapis v katalogu GeoNetwork, je priporočljiva ciljna stran zapisa (npr. https://catalog/geonetwork/srv/api/records/{uuid}). Za GeoNode stran tipa HTML deluje. Za druge se lahko uporabi dokument XML (npr. klic API ali zahteva CSW GetRecordById).
remoteRecordPropertiesError: Naslova in UUID-ja za oddaljeni zapis ni bilo mogoče pridobiti. Preverite ciljni dokument.
ui-defaultToolAfterMapLoad-help: User can open a map from different location (eg. home page maps, record view, map selector panel, URL). Define which tool panel to open by default after map is loaded. Can be empty to not activate any tool. 'layers' or 'legend' allows to easily view the list of layers in the map.
ui-languageStrategy-help:
Language strategy can be:
  • searchInAllLanguages: search using any.* fields (more records are returned)
  • searchInDetectedLanguage: restrict the search to the language detected based on user search. If language detection fails, search in all languages.
  • searchInThatLanguage: Force a language using searchInThatLanguage:fre (recommended if only one language used)
  • searchInUILanguage: search in UI languages eg. full text field is any.langfre if French
ui-languageWhitelist-help: Limit language detection to some languages only. If empty, the list of languages in catalogue records is used and if none found, mods.header.languages is used.
ui-queryBase-help: For a simple full text search on all fields use '${any}'. To give more importance to the title, use '${any} resourceTitleObject.default:(${any})^2'. See the documentation for more details. Use '${searchLang}' to set the detected language or '${uiLang}' for the user interface language.
anyFieldTitle: Search. Type in to get suggestions. Use " to search for phrases and exact match eg. "reference grid". Use q() for advanced querying eg. q(-cl_status_text:obsolete)
facetIncludeFilter: Vrednosti filtra. Regularni izraz lahko uporabite z uporabo  '/Land.*/'
indexNotAvailable: Storitev za iskanje trenutno ni na voljo !
ui-sortBy-help: Define default sort by option. eg. 'relevance' to use the computed search score (see score configuration) or 'dateStamp#desc' to return last updated record first.
csw-sortByHelp: Define sort option for GetRecords query. This can solve issue for large sets where some records may change on the remote node during harvesting and returned in different pages. Sorting by 'identifier:A' means by UUID with alphabetical order. Any CSW queryables can be used in combination with A or D for setting the ordering.
inspireApiQuotaCurrentValue: Informacije o uporabi API-ja validatorja JRC INSPIRE
dropIndexAndRebuild: Zbriši indeks in ga ponovno zgradi
rebuildIndexHelp: While rebuilding index, search may return incomplete results and the CSW GetRecords operation can be disabled (if you selected the option in the settings). Use this function, when catalog traffic is low. It's recommended to rebuild index manually from here when making changes directly in the database. If you change index mapping (cf. records.json), then you have to click on 'Delete index and reindex'.
indexInEsDoneError: Prišlo je do napake v indeksu. Za podrobnosti si oglejte dnevnike
indexCommit-help: Za uporabo samo, če naloga indeksiranja stoji.
ui-moreLikeThisConfig-help: Configuration must have a more_like_this.like which will be set with the record title to search for similar records.
ui-autocompleteConfig-help: Konfiguracija mora imeti query.multi_match.query, ki bo nastavljena na samodokončanje.
ui-facetConfig-help: This configuration is used to display facets, using either terms aggregations or filters. See the documentation for more information.
searchBadRequest: Poizvedba je vrnila napako. Za podrobnosti preverite konzolo.
searchInvalidResponse: Poizvedba je vrnila neveljaven odgovor. Za podrobnosti preverite konzolo.
exactMatch-help: Natančno ujemanje pomeni, da so iskalnim izrazom dodani  '"'.
featuresInMapExtent: Samo elementi v trenutnem obsegu zemljevida
heatmapAvailableForPointOnly: Heatmap je podprt samo za točkovno plast.
wfsIndexingTriggerError: Napaka se je pojavila pri začetku harvestiranja.
clearCheckboxFormChanges: Clear modified checkbox state. Checkboxes with '-' means that those values will be removed from the selection.
addThoseCategories-help: Dodajte (označeno z +) ali odstranite (potrditveno polje z -) izbrane kategorije.
replaceByThoseCategories-help: Odstranite kategorije zapisov in nato dodajte (označeno s +) ali odstranite (potrditveno polje z -) izbrane kategorije.
addThoseOperations-help: Dodaj (označeno z +) ali odstrani (potrditveno polje z -) izbrane privilegije.
privilegesNeededForPublicationRecordGrou: Če želite objaviti zapis, morate biti skrbnik ali pregledovalec skupine zapisov
To publish a record, you need to be administrator or reviewer of record group or reviewer of a group with editing rights.
replaceByThoseOperations-help: Odstranite privilegije zapisa in nato dodajte (označeno z +) ali odstranite (potrditveno polje z -) izbrane privilegije.
ui-moreLikeThisSameType: Več takšnih nakazuje zapise iste vrste
ui-showPortalSwitcher: Prikaži meni portala v zgornjem meniju
ui-dateFormat-help: Oblika datumov v privzetem pogledu zapisa.
ui-locationThesaurus-help: Postavite ključne besede, ki bodo prikazane pod predogled zemljevida
ui-internalThesaurus-help: Keywords to be displayed only for authenticated users. Usually thesaurus used for management purposes only.
ui-collectionTableConfig: Za serije konfigurirajte stolpec seznama podatkovnih zbirk
ui-timezone-help: The time zone to use to render date in default view and option to be added to editor date picker. If there is no need to handle multiple timezone in the catalog, set this value to the server timezone (see admin > settings). 'browser' indicate to use the browser timezone.
wpsOutputAsReference-help: Zahtevajte odgovor kot URL (na voljo bo za prenos ob uspehu).
wpsLoadReferenceInMap-help: Try to download the reference URL with the response and load it on the map (needs to be GeoJSON response).
ui-wpsSource-help: An ordered array of 'list' (see list of service for WPS type), 'url' (user can put a URL) or 'recent' (recent WPS service used are stored in browser local storage).
translationPackClearCache-help: Required if you change JSON translation files of the Javascript application in catalog/locale, database translations or schema JSON translations.
translationPackCacheClearFailure: Med brisanjem predpomnilnika prevajalskih paketov je prišlo do napake!
ui-queryTitleExactMatch: Poizvedba z natančnim ujemanjem samo na naslovu
facets.temporalRange.help:
Drag out a brush to select a data range or click on a bar on the lower chart. Click out the selected range to unset. Click the filter button to search.

Blue series: current search, Grey series: all records.
facets.temporalRange.seriesLegend: Modra serija: trenutno iskanje, siva serija: vsi zapisi
indexStatusSynchronized-error: When number of records is not equal in the database and in the index, check first that the catalogue point to the correct index. If yes, try to reindex the catalogue from admin > tools. If there is still a difference, check for indexing errors in the log file and fix the metadata record using the XML view.
IndexReadOnlyHealthCheck: Indeks je v načinu samo za branje
noINSPIRETestTokenAvailable: Validator INSPIRE je vrnil prazen žeton. Statusa preverjanja zdaj ni mogoče preveriti. Preverite konfiguracijo in ključ API ali poskusite pozneje.
system/localrating/notificationLevel-hel: Določite, katere uporabnike opozoriti v primeru ocene.
system/inspire/remotevalidation/apikey-h: Users and organisations interested in receiving an API key will need to contact the Validator team by sending an e-mail to JRC-INSPIRE-SUPPORT AT ec.europa.eu and provide the following information: name of the organisation, responsible contact point and intended use of the API key.
system/inspire/remotevalidation/nodeid-h: If null, the record is uploaded to the validator, if a node is defined, then the CSW url of this node is used, the validator will make a GetRecordById request to retrieve the record.
system/security/password/allowAdminReset: If a mail server is configured, then users can reset password directly. For security reason, enable this option only if there is no mail server configured.
ui/chooseAnOption-help: Trenutna uporabniška konfiguracija je prazna. Izberite eno ali več zgornjih možnosti ali ustvarite celotno konfiguracijo.
ui-full-configuration: Vse privzete možnosti (ponastavi vse trenutne možnosti)
ui-queryTitle: Poizvedba za iskanje samo po naslovu
pageIcon-help: Po želji lahko definirate ikono font-awesome . Primer: 'fa-wrench'.
searchAllLanguages-help: Določite, kateri jezik daje prednost nekaterim zapisom.
cite.format.ris.help: Format oznake, ki ga je razvil Research Information Systems.
cite.format.bibtex.help: A BibTeX database file is formed by a list of entries, with each entry corresponding to a bibliographical item.
searchAndReplaceEditsHelp: Uporabite zbirko podatkov za izvajanje operacije iskanja in zamenjave.
regexpFlags: Oznake regularnega izraza (odvisno od uporabljene baze podatkov)
regexpFlags-n: omogoča, da se pika ujema z znakom za novo vrstico
regexpFlags-i: omogoča ujemanje brez razlikovanja med velikimi in malimi črkami
regexpFlags-c: onemogoči ujemanje brez razlikovanja med velikimi in malimi črkami
harvesterConfigIsNotJson: Konfiguracija harvesterja mora biti konfiguracija JSON.
harvesterConfigIsNotValid: Zdi se, da konfiguracija harvesterja ni veljavna konfiguracija.
toggleOptions: Preklop možnosti filtra (odpiranje ali zapiranje drevesa filtrov)
ui-showMosaic: Pokaži pregledni mozaik na domači strani
ui-showMaps: Pokaži najnovejše zemljevide na domači strani
batchEditConfigIsNotValid:
Batch edit configuration is invalid. It must be a JSON 
{"insertMode": "gn_add", "xpath": "...", "value": "..."}
wmstime-info: Browse {{layerName}} over time. This dataset provides data for {{instantNumber}} dates from {{start}} to {{end}}.
wmselevation-info: Browse {{layerName}} elevation dimension. This dataset provides data for {{instantNumber}} elevations from {{start}} to {{end}}.
atom.title: Naslov vira
atom.author: Avtor
uploadedResourceAlreadyExistException: Datoteka {{file}} že obstaja v tej shrambi podatkov zapisa. Najprej ga odstranite.
staticPageFormat-HTML: Vsebina HTML, prikazana vdelana v aplikaciji
staticPageFormat-HTMLPAGE: Vsebina HTML, prikazana v novem zavihku brskalnika
pageSection-help: Currently, the default UI view only supports TOP and FOOTER values. Custom UI views can make use of additional values.
filterHelp: Kliknite na enega od spodnjih gumbov, da aktivirate filter
